```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
data_train <- 
  raw_data_train %>% 
  rename(tweeter = X1, date_time = X2, tweet_text = X3) %>%
  mutate(labels = ifelse(tweeter == "Trump", 1, -1))

```
